storyInfo: Promoting the Landen Monastery as an idol is not easy, but Archetto's kindness reaps surprising rewards.

attributes.content: We are here today to commemorate the past, and to welcome a new beginning.
All who stand with me today are my brothers and sisters. Fate has brought us together, and every bond that we formed is a gift given to us by the monastery.
We will not forget the bread and the beer, nor the bells and the fields. We will not forget the Law that we studied, nor the love that we shared.
We meet here today to bid farewell to Landen Monastery.
Is there no other way?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I understand your feelings, but the church has decided to close the monastery down at the end of the year.
attributes.name: Pious Cleric

attributes.content: It can no longer support itself, and the church will no longer fund its operations.
attributes.name: Pious Cleric

attributes.content: All we can do is bid it a respectful and dignified farewell.
attributes.name: Pious Cleric

attributes.content: Can we not have a little more time? Everyone is doing their utmost to find a way to save the monastery.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Maybe we'll find a way to improve our finances...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I'm afraid the church has already given us more than enough time.
attributes.name: Pious Cleric

attributes.content: But why does it have to be demolished?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: If we could at least keep the building...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: The monastery's land will have to be sold to repay its debts.
attributes.name: Pious Cleric

attributes.content: While we'll always have fond memories of its fields and its sunshine, we should not prevent the land from realizing its value.
attributes.name: Pious Cleric

attributes.content: Maybe I could have prevented this if only I'd worked harder...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I regret this as much as you do, sister, but as the teachings say, we must learn to accept what we cannot change.
attributes.name: Pious Cleric

attributes.content: May the beauty of days past live forever in our memories, and bless the future of our brothers and sisters—
attributes.name: Pious Cleric

attributes.content: Now leave the demolition to me!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Exusiai?!
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Obviously abandoned buildings should be disposed of, pronto.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: So if this monastery isn't doing its job anymore, there's only one thing left to do—blow it up spectacularly!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Wait a second! Even if it must be demolished, it should be done respectfully, not like this—
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Coming through, coming through!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: No time to talk! Let's send this centuries-old antique out with a bang!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Three, two—
attributes.name: Exusiai
Hildegard
attributes.content: Wait––

attributes.name: Hildegard
attributes.content: Wait!
Wait!
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Oh, thank goodness, it was just a dream...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Oh right! There was a meet-and-greet session today... did I fall asleep on the job?!
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Don't worry, no one showed up in the half hour that you were dozing off.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I see, that's a relief...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: No it's not!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: We've been here since early morning, and we haven't sold a single album!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: There are long lines in front of every other artist's booth, too. This is pretty awful, even considering your current popularity... or lack thereof.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I should have worked harder.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Oh, I'm not saying you're lazy. I know how much effort you've put in.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: But it takes more than hard work to be an idol! You need relevancy and instant appeal!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: It's my fault too, for approving that nun gimmick of yours. Next time, we really ought to be more conscious of local appeal.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Gimmick? I was only being myself...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: (And what purpose is there in being an idol, if I can't promote the monastery?)
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: To be blunt, your career is at a crossroads.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Today's meet-and-greet and album signing session is our last chance. If we can't sell these leftover albums, we might as well pack our bags.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I'm not sure what I can do at this point, but I'll give it my all!
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Look, someone's coming over!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Get ready! This might be our first customer of the day!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Ahem...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: (Recites without a hitch)
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: 'The bells sing a song of love. We meet today, as ordained by beautiful fate.'
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Welcome, and let us listen to the sounds of love and hope together!
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Buy a copy of 'Sonata of Love's Bells' today, and get a free box of Landen Monastery's famous cystymilk bread!
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: (Makes a pose that is energetic but dignified)
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Y-You're the famous—!
attributes.name: Excited Fan

attributes.content: Oh, I'm so lucky! I never thought I'd see you here!
attributes.name: Excited Fan

attributes.content: Thank you for the support. I wouldn't exactly call myself 'famous' though...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: I hear you over the radio all the time, and I've bought a lot of your albums.
attributes.name: Excited Fan

attributes.content: This is the first time I've seen you in person, but you're just as brilliant as I imagined you'd be!
attributes.name: Excited Fan

attributes.content: (Is this what it's like to be popular? Deep breaths, deep breaths, look like an idol!)
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: (Sunny and elegant smile)
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Thank you very much. Please continue to support my songs.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: 'Those who know to appreciate others are blessed with wisdom and kindness.' May good fortune be upon you.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Your voice is so sweet! Just like the way you sing!
attributes.name: Excited Fan

attributes.content: I'm so excited I got to meet you today!
attributes.name: Excited Fan

attributes.content: So can I get your autograph, Sora?
attributes.name: Excited Fan
Archetto
attributes.content: Of course! Everyone here for the meet-and-greet will—

attributes.name: Archetto
attributes.content: ...Sora?
...Sora?
attributes.name: Confused Fan

attributes.content: You got the wrong person.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: The sign says 'Archetto,' not 'Sora.'
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Archetto? Who's Archetto?
attributes.name: Perplexed Fan

attributes.content: Anyone else would've been furious at getting mistaken for another idol at their own meet-and-greet...
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: But you even gave him bread?
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: 'Do not resent a misunderstanding,' 'Do not be carried away by fame that does not belong to you,'...That's what the teachings say.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: There's no reason to get angry at that gentleman over a simple mistake.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Well, that's nice, but has it ever occurred to you that this is why you don't have any fans?
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I thought it was because my singing and dancing weren't good enough.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: No, what you're lacking most is the ability to promote your character.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Your gimmick is a nun, but you can't just 'be a nun' in front of the fans.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: You need to identify what fans love about the image of a nun, and refine, polish, and deliver on that.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: But I only know how to be a cleric, not how to be an idol.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: I understand that I'm promoting a business, but it always feels like I'm hiding my face behind that of another.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: The most important thing for a professional idol is to generate interest with your image and bring in revenue. That's what the advertisers are investing in, at least.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Failing to maintain a consistent and appealing image will only hurt the sponsors.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Have I... ever done anything to hurt the sponsors?
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Advertising your monastery's cystymilk bread in a dessert parlor ad, bringing up beer on talk shows, getting caught on video catching a thief on the streets...
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Don't tell me you forgot all that?
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: While I understand now that a young idol shouldn't be talking about drinking... how exactly is catching a thief a bad thing?
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: The facts notwithstanding, all the public saw was an idol getting into a street fight.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: And clarifying what happened isn't cheap either.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Not to mention how the children's clothing brand was NOT happy with their brand ambassador getting into a fight, regardless of why.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: They never mentioned that in the contract...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: No, I apologize, it was my fault.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: I had high hopes for you, you know... I've always been confident in my eye for talent.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Money aside, I was looking forward to seeing 'Archetto' shining brightly on stage.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I wish I could have done more.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Never mind that. Keep doing what you need to here. I'll ask around the other booths and see if we can get some tips.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: What it means to be a professional idol...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Excuse me!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Er... yes?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: You seem to carry yourself well. Have you ever thought about becoming an idol?
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Er... an idol? What does that mean?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: You don't even know what an idol is?!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Well... in short, it's about singing and dancing, becoming famous, and bringing hope and joy to people!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: (Singing? Dancing? I do regularly sing hymns, but I've never danced...)
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Just imagine! Standing on the big stage in beautiful costumes, thousands of eyes focused solely on you. The feeling of accomplishment—
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: (Becoming famous? Could this be a chance to promote the monastery?)
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Would becoming an idol let me use my fame to advertise products?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: (Wow, this girl really gets it!)
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Of course! You're absolutely free to, once you're on the right track.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Well, you've piqued my interest. Could you elaborate?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Excellent! No time to waste. Let's find a place to sit down and go over the contract!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I thought I'd found an opportunity to promote the monastery, but I can't even fulfill the basic terms of the contract.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: The teachings were right. 'Paths that look too smooth often lead you astray.'
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Promoting the monastery isn't easy at all...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Oh, someone's coming.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: 'The bells of love welcome you, visitor from afar—'
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Er... May I help you?
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Excuse me, I saw the sign next to the bread that says 'free giveaway'... So you're handing it out for free?
attributes.name: Old Lady

attributes.content: Er, yes, as part of the meet-and-greet...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: So I can get bread just for shaking hands with you?
attributes.name: Old Lady

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: (It's supposed to be for buying the albums, isn't it?)
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: (But this old woman looks...)
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: ...It's alright. Go ahead and take one.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Old Lady

attributes.content: Of course! I'm just glad to be of help.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: 'May your honesty and kindness be repaid with peace and happiness in equal measure.'
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: I haven't had anything this good in a month...
attributes.name: Old Lady

attributes.content: Thank you so much. You're very kind.
attributes.name: Old Lady

attributes.content: The old lady grasps Archetto's hand firmly, as though to communicate her gratitude.
The touch of her rough skin is warm and sincere.
Thank you for your support. Have a beautiful day.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: My first, er, fan?
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Well, that takes us from zero to one. Keep at it; it's our last chance to revitalize the monastery!
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: H-Hello...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Hello! Can I have some bread?
attributes.name: Innocent Girl

attributes.content: Bread...?
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Someone told me I could get free bread here!
attributes.name: Innocent Girl

attributes.content: Well... not exactly...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: (But I can't make a child this small pay for it, can I?)
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: ...Here you go. If you like it, tell your friends, too!
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: And thank you for the support. 'May the gospels watch over you, and grant you wisdom and health.'
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Thank you! Your voice is so sweet, and you're so pretty, just like those idols on TV!
attributes.name: Innocent Girl

attributes.content: 'Just like those idols,' eh? Should I take that as a compliment?
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: (Approaches quietly)
attributes.name: Impoverished Young Man

attributes.content: H-Hello!
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: 'The voice of love is always here for you...' Would you like an autographed album?
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: (Scratches head in embarrassment)
attributes.name: Impoverished Young Man

attributes.content: (This gentleman doesn't look like he has a lot of money to spare...)
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Ahem... thank you for the support. Please, have some bread.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: (Takes the bread eagerly)
attributes.name: Impoverished Young Man

attributes.content: (Leaves in satisfaction)
attributes.name: Impoverished Young Man

attributes.content: Thank you... have a beautiful day...
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Should I move the sign advertising the album to a more prominent position?
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: I'm back!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: They were handing out cystymilk bread in the old district!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Are you serious?! Next you'll be telling me there's only one moon in the sky!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It looked like charity work by the Lateran church? There were lots of people standing in line, almost like one of my concerts.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The nun handing it out was really nice and pretty, and the bread tastes great too. Much better than those dessert parlors you see everywhere.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Wow, you're right, it reminds me of home.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Does the Lateran church often do things like this?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Maybe, but they seem more likely to hand out dessert coupons.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Say, I think I've seen the girl handing them out somewhere before... but where?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Alright, I'm on scene, chief.
attributes.name: Tabloid Reporter

attributes.content: Sheesh, what's the point of reporting on meet-and-greets by no-name idols? Any article I get out of this won't even pay for the taxi fare.
attributes.name: Tabloid Reporter

attributes.content: Guess I'll just take a couple of photos and—hey, what's with that crowd?
attributes.name: Tabloid Reporter

attributes.content: And at the head of the line is... the girl I caught on film beating someone up on the streets the other day?!
attributes.name: Tabloid Reporter

attributes.content: Well now, you don't see crowds like this in the slums every day.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I wonder if Tung would get as many people lined up if he handed out free finballs.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Never underestimate what a good promotional image can do for you. Not that I ever expected her to make it this big when I chose to work with her.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: You've always had an eye for business partners. I suppose not all Laterans are like those crazy girls working for the penguin.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I've always placed high value on cultural exchange in business.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Of course, it's debatable whether taking a pure loss like she is counts as 'business.'
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: A bit of foreign culture in your life is never a bad thing.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Maybe you could talk to Wei, see if he'd approve the construction of a Lateran chapel in the slums?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Give those old folks a place to sit during the day, at any rate. All the better if there's more free bread.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Archetto... what's with this line?! You didn't use Arts, did you?!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I'm not sure. I was acting as I always do... as a cleric.
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: Wait, but why haven't you sold any albums yet?
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Oh, never mind that for now... come on, say your catchphrases while everyone's listening!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: 'We gather here today, brothers and sisters all.'
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: 'We will all love each other, help each other...'
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: ...Like that?
attributes.name: Archetto

attributes.content: That just makes it even weirder!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: A long line forms in front of an unremarkable booth in a corner of this great city.
The setting sun paints the people's heads golden as a Liberi girl continues to give out bread to the people in line, to the tune of hymns arranged with drumbeat loops.
A peaceful scene, reminiscent of a mural in a cathedral.
Are you sure you don't want to renew your contract?
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Yes, I have no regrets.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Even though we didn't sell any albums last time, there's no question that it went viral on the web.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: 'What a public personality should be like,' 'A true nun idol'... that's what they're calling you!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: You'll have access to so many more resources now if you stay.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I'm sure you'd be shining on the big stage before long. Just like Sora!
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: No... I've decided to step away.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I've fulfilled my contract and promoted the monastery in Lungmen. It's time to look for other business partners.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Well, I guess it's back to square one... What a shame; I thought I'd finally found someone who was going to make it big.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I apologize, and thank you for everything you've done for me. But I have other things that I need to do.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I've been away from Laterano for so long, but I've never forgotten my true goal: to spread the Lateran faith.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Succeeding at business was never what I really wanted.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: And even if I must out of necessity, I'd rather be selling something more tangible, more concrete.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: That's very honest of you... Well, it's a pity, but I understand. Good luck.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: What are your plans, then?
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: 'Opportunity lies on the path that leads far into the distance.' We'll see.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Well... before you leave, there's a concert being organized by Monster Siren Records, and the sponsor, MountainDash Logistics, has sent you a personal invitation.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Even if you have to go, would you at least consider making a farewell appearance?
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Did you say Monster Siren Records? And MountainDash Logistics?!
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: What's that you're looking at?
attributes.name: Cheerful Cleric

attributes.content: There was something else mixed in with the taped movies Fiammetta brought back.
attributes.name: Solemn Cleric

attributes.content: Is that Hildegard singing on stage?!
attributes.name: Cheerful Cleric

attributes.content: I never thought she had it in her.
attributes.name: Solemn Cleric

attributes.content: It's not so strange when you think about it. She's always had a beautiful singing voice. But this hymn has some interesting variations.
attributes.name: Cheerful Cleric

attributes.content: What do they call the people who do this, again? Idols?
attributes.name: Solemn Cleric

attributes.content: Maybe we could learn from it to help promote the monastery?
attributes.name: Solemn Cleric?

attributes.content: What would we perform? Musicals based on religious stories? Choral performances?
attributes.name: Cheerful Cleric

attributes.content: We'd need some foreign characters too, if we want to catch people's attention in Laterano.
attributes.name: Solemn Cleric?

attributes.content: Say... what do you think of a joint performance by Kazimierzian knights and Iberian Inquisitors?
attributes.name: Solemn Cleric?
